channel.title: AES on The Encryption Compendium
channel.description: Recent content in AES on The Encryption Compendium

item.title: Announcing the Advanced Encryption Standard (AES)
item.description: Authors: NIST Published: November 2001 URL: https://web.archive.org/web/20030406010431/http://www.csrc.nist.gov/publications/fips/fips197/fips-197.pdf Tags: 2000s AES Encryption Standards NIST

item.title: How secure is AES Against Brute Force Attacks?
item.description: Authors: EETimes Published: May 2012 URL: https://www.eetimes.com/how-secure-is-aes-against-brute-force-attacks/ Tags: 2010s AES Keys Abstract: This article describes the strength of the cryptographic system against brute force attacks with different key sizes and the time it takes to successfully mount a brute force attack factoring future advancements in processing speeds.
